page.title: 11Public Houses
page.content: There are 3 public houses or pubs in the area.The smallest is the{Verdin {Arms}which is in Minshull Vernon.The {Bear's Paw }and the {Grange }are in Warmingham.The 2 former are typical co untry pubs selling drinks and food.The Grange is the most interesting of them as it reflects the modern trend of nos talgia.It was the Rectory until the 1960's when it was sold being too larg e and expensive to run as the living no longer provides the income it did owing to modern farming methods which have led to the decline of the rural population.)The old stables have been converted into a pub,the {Bull and Bus {h}and an extension has been added to provide the setting for the{Medieval {Banquets}which are held every Saturday night in Winter.The food and drinks ar e old English and cutlery is kept to the minimum.There is room for 200.
